price: Allah, elbette iman edenleri biliyor ve elbette münafıkları da biliyor.
arabic: وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walayaʿlamanna al-lahu alladhīna āmanū walayaʿlamanna al-munāfiqīna
translations: And Allah will surely make evident
And Allah will surely make evident
And He will surely make evident
